page.title: 02MY DAY
page.content: I get up about 0810 hrs GMT, wash myself and get dressed. I don't have any breakfast. At about 0835 hrs GMT I get a chocolate biscuit,open the door on the side of my father's {Fiat}car and my Dad drives me to St.James School{South Bank}where I am educated. For dinner I usually have saute potato,a pastie and beans followed by a slice of sponge cake.To drink I have water. I get home from school at about 1545 hrs and then have my tea.I have salad with wholemeal crispbread. I put my {Sinclair Spectrum 48K}on and play Ghostbusters.At 2100 hrs I go upstairs and watch{television}until about 2300 hrs and then get into my bed with 4 blankets and a quilt on and go to sleep. by Gareth Healy age 11
